Intervals

Module Summary

Module with code related to musical intervals.

Imports

notes: Import the classes and exception of the module.

Global variables

intervals.ALL_INTERVAL_NAMES: list[str | tuple]

All names of intervals with enharmonics in tuples.

intervals.ALL_INTERVAL_NAMES_UNPACKED: list

All names of intervals in order.

Exceptions

InvalidIntervalAttributeError: Raised when an interval’s invalid.

Functions

all_about_interval(): Return a message with data on an interval.

interval_input(): Receive input and transforms into an interval.

get_note_interface(): Bridge between get_second_note and user.

get_name_interface(): Bridge between get_name() and user.

run(): Run the module as a script.

Classes

Interval: Defines intervals and their methods.

Functions

intervals.all_about_interval(interval: Interval)
intervals.interval_input(message)
intervals.get_note_interface()
intervals.get_name_interface()

Classes

Interval Summary

class intervals.Interval(name='', note1=<musicinpython.notes.Note object>, note2: ~musicinpython.notes.Note = '')

Class that defines musical intervals and their methods.

Attributes

name: str

The name of the interval (e.g.:”VII”).

note1: Note

First note of the interval.

note2: Note

Second note of the interval.

__init__(name='', note1=<musicinpython.notes.Note object>, note2: ~musicinpython.notes.Note = '')
